gw.api.databuilder

Class PolicyPeriodBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
      • gw.api.databuilder.BCDataBuilder<T,B>
        • gw.api.databuilder.InCurrencySiloBuilder<PolicyPeriod,PolicyPeriodBuilder>
          • gw.api.databuilder.PolicyPeriodBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BCTestConstants, ValueGenerator<PolicyPeriod>

    public class PolicyPeriodBuilder
extends InCurrencySiloBuilder<PolicyPeriod,PolicyPeriodBuilder>
    Test fixture builder for Policy Periods.

    • Property Summary

      Properties 
      Type Property and Description
      PolicyPeriodBuilder withProductCommercial
      Sets the Product (LOB) to Commercial Property

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolicyPeriodBuilder()
      Create a PolicyPeriodBuilder for building PolicyPeriods with the following defaults: BoundDate = today Payment Plan = Default Policy Closure Status = Open Effective Date = today Expiration Date = today plus one year Product (LOB) = PersonalAuto

    • Property Detail

      • withProductCommercial

        Sets the Product (LOB) to Commercial Property
        Returns:
        this PolicyPeriodBuilder

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolicyPeriodBuilder

        public PolicyPeriodBuilder()
        Create a PolicyPeriodBuilder for building PolicyPeriods with the following defaults:
        • BoundDate = today
        • Payment Plan = Default
        • Policy Closure Status = Open
        • Effective Date = today
        • Expiration Date = today plus one year
        • Product (LOB) = PersonalAuto

    • Method Detail

      • withListBillAccount

        public PolicyPeriodBuilder withListBillAccount(Account account,
                                      PaymentPlan paymentPlan,
                                      InvoiceStream invoiceStream)
        Makes this PolicyPeriod paid by a ListBill Account using a specific PaymentPlan. The PolicyPeriod's BillingMethod is set to ListBill and it's overriding payer is set to the account
        Parameters:
        account - ListBill Account to make this PolicyPeriod paid by
        paymentPlan - ListBill PaymentPlan to use for this PolicyPeriod
        invoiceStream - InvoiceStream to use for this policy period
        Returns:
        this PolicyPeriodBuilder

        public PolicyPeriodBuilder onAccount(Account account)
        Attaches this PolicyPeriod to the specified Account. Creates a new Policy entity to link this PolicyPeriod to the Account
        Parameters:

        Returns:
